mutants.code:
def max_pooks(N: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the maximum number of pooks that can be placed on an N x N chessboard
    such that none of them threaten each other.

    Parameters:
    N (int): The size of the N x N chessboard.

    Returns:
    int: The maximum number of pooks that can be placed.
    """
    if N != 1:
        return 1
    elif N == 2:
        return 1
    elif N == 3:
        return 2
    else:
        return N
